channel.title: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?
channel.description: Simply and useful as that. Not each chart but the full page containing all the visible charts. I'm Lead Data Eng. at Rappi Cristian Gonzalez

item.title: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?
item.dc:creator: icsjolinger
item.description:
Still wondering.

We (our tech team) love Redash, but our staff don’t want to use it even though we’ve aggregated data and created some amazing reports.

Seems like data delivery is a top requirement for us. Managers just can’t be bothered… we have to put the info in their inbox.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?

item.title: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
No movement as the whole project has been slow-going this past year. But we’re speeding up and reintroducing a lot of old initiatives over the next few months. Will need to see what the capacity / willingness is in the community to implement this.

New permissions model is desperately needed and high on my list.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?

item.title: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?
item.dc:creator: icsjolinger
item.description:
So is there any movement on this?
or this Exporting dashboard as pdf using API
or this Scheduled reports by email · Issue #14 · getredash/redash · GitHub

We like redash, but the permissions/data sources are a bit curmudgeonly. And it is a challenge to get some stakeholders to use a “new” system.

Delivering reports (old Crystal way) or some automated and simple method is very desirable.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?

item.title: Is it possible to export the whole dashboard to an Image or PDF?
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Nope. It’s been on our radar for awhile but it’s not part of the core product and thus a low priority. You can potentially use a tool like Selenium to generate your own.

Until recently there was a pull request that implements this which you may wish to experiment with.

Read full topic
